As part of its customer care philosophy , K&S highly regards p roduct safety as a basic requirement . K&S 
assesses and mitigates  the potential health and safety risks posed to customers throughout  the 
various stages of product manufacturing. With the  Green Initiative, the company  aims to achieve RoHS 
compliance for all new core equipment platforms  laun ched  from  FY2018 . Two RoHS -compliant ball 
bonder models —RAPIDTM Pro and OptoLuxTM—were well received by customers . Several RoHS -
compliant wedge bonder equipment  are in the pipeline , slated for release in FY2019. For more 
information, please refer to the RoHS section (page 33). 
All current K&S equipment  are CE-certified  being  assessed to meet health, safety and environmental 
protection requirements , and can be traded freely within the European Economic Area (EEA). Upon 
request, K&S will work closely with customers to meet their additional product safety requirements.  
In FY2018 , zero validated cases of non -compliance regarding the health and safety impacts  of products 
and services  are recorded  – a target K&S aims to maintain .
